channel.title: Your opinion?
channel.description: I was thinking about putting together the RS 2012 site. I dont mean using httrack and screaming I stole their site, I mean actually putting effort into it, creating admin page, login system, report, etc. Do you think its even worth my time? Will other users want it? I could do it for just myself to learn but if others wanted it "to learn" then I would release it.

item.title: Your opinion?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“jal knight, post:5, topic:478059”][quote author=The Web Guy link=topic=596256.msg4199080#msg4199080 date=1357915872]

I was thinking about putting together the RS 2012 site. I dont mean using httrack and screaming I stole their site, I mean actually putting effort into it, creating admin page, login system, report, etc.
Do you think its even worth my time? Will other users want it?
I could do it for just myself to learn but if others wanted it “to learn” then I would release it.

I could do it in about an hour, I have a release of the late 2011 website already, but if you think that users will benefit from it, go for it. You should create an SMF theme to match runescape forums, and pair them. Then, I’d be surprised.
[/quote]
lol okay show off I was actually just about to message you. Do you know of a php graph that you can use mysql with thats not terribly difficult to use?[/quote]

You could make your own, or checkout JPGraph.

Read full topic

item.title: Your opinion?

[quote=“jal knight, post:1, topic:478059”]I was thinking about putting together the RS 2012 site. I dont mean using httrack and screaming I stole their site, I mean actually putting effort into it, creating admin page, login system, report, etc.
Do you think its even worth my time? Will other users want it?
I could do it for just myself to learn but if others wanted it “to learn” then I would release it.[/quote]

item.title: Your opinion?
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

RSCShadow:

You wouldn’t really be able to use it in production.

Not very long anyways.

This is the only area of the website where I can actually give back and I’m about out of ideas. I’m working on a new admin page for the last project I released. After I’m done with that I’ll be clueless on what to do.

Read full topic
